definition: we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
I or me/we (including both the speaker and the person spoken to)
variant of 咱[zan2]
see 咱[zan2]
variant of 咱[zan2]
plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals

sentences.english: Lets go to the cinema together, and Ill call for you.
sentences.chinese: 咱们一起去看电影吧，到时候我来叫你。

sentences.english: I will leave aside, for the moment, what happens on Friday and Saturday nights.
sentences.chinese: 咱们暂时不要考虑，星期五，星期六的夜晚。

sentences.english: If everyone keeps in line, we'll get through the Customs more quickly.
sentences.chinese: 要是大家都守制序，咱们会很快通过海关的。
孩子们，安静点!咱们开始吧。

sentences.english: First off, allow us to apologize for the abductions.
sentences.chinese: 首先，请容许咱们为绑票地球人而表达歉意。

sentences.english: To not follow the truly humane will bring immeasurable harm.
sentences.chinese: 要是不亲热有仁德的人，那将带给咱们如许大的坏处。

sentences.english: Let us visit workshop, polo homme, OK?
Our seats are in the grandstand.
sentences.chinese: 咱们的座位在正面看台。

sentences.english: Let's have something with a local flavor .
sentences.chinese: 咱们来吃点有地方风味的东西。

sentences.english: We read books aloud a lot in our family.
sentences.chinese: 咱们的家人常大声朗诵书。
咱们把这幅画涂成蓝色。

sentences.english: The long exhausting trip proved too abundance.
sentences.chinese: 这次旅行矿日持久，咱们都累倒了。

sentences.english: Our classroom is the differerent scal as theirs.
sentences.chinese: 咱们的教室和她们的相同大。

(onom.) smack!
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides

to return to the topic (idiom)/to get back to the main point
to say sth
we/us/ourselves/our
to take a look at/to examine/to survey/(coll.) pretty soon

Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
as for/when it comes to
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
woolen material

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
